title: Drawing, "Designs for Exterior Scenes, for Othello", 1932
inscribed: Inscribed in white chalk, beneath upper drawing: Part 2. Act II. Scene II.; beneath lower drawing: Part. 2. Act II. Scene III.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Two exterior set designs. Upper drawing depicts buildings with crenellation and stairs at the center, and three arched doorways, brick building on the left; lower drawing depicts a rounded arched space with a bust in white at the central opening (possibly the castle’s garden), an arched doorway at the right. Two hole punches on the left edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Exterior Scenes, for Othello", 1932.
1932. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-186.
